name: Create a contact in ActiveCampaign from a Google Ads Lead Forms submission
description:
Please disable your ad blockers when working with our Google Ads apps. The ad blockers may cause unexpected behavior.

Every time a new Google Ads Lead form is submitted, Make will automatically create a contact in ActiveCampaign. 

The template expects your lead form to collect at least these fields:
1) First Name
2) Last Name
3) User Email
4) User Phone
